description: {"blocks":[{"key":"co22l","text":"This protocol describes how to harvest human tissue biopsy and prepare it for histological processes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"dmdsc","text":"The protocols.io team notes that research involving animals and humans must be conducted according to internationally-accepted standards and should always have prior approval from an Institutional Ethics Committee or Board.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9149D571F58F11EE8D8E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"86tmh","text":"For tissue collection container, we will prefill histology containers with 10% Neutral Buffered Formalin (NBF) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ferdr","text":"Combine 100 mL of Formaldehyde (37% - 40%), 900mL of distilled water, 4g of Sodium dihydrogen phosphate monohydrate, and 6.5g of disodium hydrogen phosphate anhydrous.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8e8p","text":"The surgical procedures for scalp skin include tissue expansion, nerve release,\nhair transplantation, local tissue rearrangement.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"97ju7","text":"Confirm that the pH of the solution is between 6.8 and 7.2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a45v5","text":"One can purchase this instead: VWR‱ Prefilled Histology Containers, 10% Neutral Buffered Formalin (NBF) Cat. No. 16004-121","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D6EAF57CED5711EE9FCF0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sm3r","text":"Hair bearing areas are chosen and areas with a paucity of hair follicles including\nthose from advanced androgenic alopecia or alopecia areata are excluded.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"pk8e","text":"We collect our samples from tissues normally discarded during surgical procedures.\nThe surgical procedures for trunk skin include deep inferior epigastric artery\nperforator flaps, panniculectomy, abdominoplasty, reduction mammaplasty. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d3p3u","text":"Once the biopsy is harvested, we immediately put it into the tissue collection container to fix the tissue and avoid the degradation. The time delay between tissue excision and fixation, warm ischemic time, is a critical factor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3url6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kg3d","text":"Note on the effect of delay to formalin fixation - Delay to\nformalin fixation effect on breast biomarkers - PubMed (nih.gov)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":73}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6A4099D5ED5B11EE9FCF0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19734848"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvjij","text":"Please refer to our tissue fixation protocol for the next steps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":24}],"data":{}},{"key":"bmm66","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E113B3D4C57C4DDF9271DCEF425EDBD4","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.3byl4929jgo5/v1"}}}}

title: Tissue Harvesting | HuBMAP | JHU-TMC
